title: Data may be used freely for non-commercial research and educational activities. Please contact helpdesk@ega-archive.org if you aim to use the data for other activities.
policy_text: When using the data, the following should be acknowledged: the RD-Connect GPAP (https://platform.rd-connect.eu/), EC H2020 project EJP-RD (grant # 825575), EC H2020 project B1MG (grant # 951724) and Generalitat de Catalunya VEIS project (grant # 001-P-001647).
